description.@en: I’ve got dirt on practically every person in this city.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You can dig up sensitive information on a character who has been listed in a broadsheet (newspaper) or magazine. Using this information, you then gain an Assist Die to interact with them in social situations. You can take advantage of this Trait once a game session.
